remarks: A finite sum of nonnegative numbers is less or equal to its limit. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
statement:
isumless.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
isumless.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
isumless.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
isumless.4 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ Z ) $.
isumless.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = B ) $.
isumless.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> B e. RR ) $.
isumless.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> 0 <_ B ) $.
isumless.8 $e |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) $.
isumless $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B <_ sum_ k e. Z B ) $.
$d A k $.
$d F k $.
$d M k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
